simplesect.para: A vector representation of a 1152-bit unsigned integer.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para: A homogeneous aggregate of 9 x 128-bit unsigned integer fields. The low order field is named vx0, progressing to the high order field vx8.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: Useful for returning the result of a 1024x128-bit multiply.
This structure does not qualify for parameter passing in registers (more than 8 registers are required) and will be passed in memory.
